title: Fluorescent dye makes 'invisible' microplastics glow
text:
Fluorescent dye makes 'invisible' microplastics glow 10:35am BST - 01:56 
Researchers at the University of Warwick develop a method to spot the smallest mircoplastic particles floating in the world's oceans; as small as the width of a human hair. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers at the University of Warwick develop a method to spot the smallest mircoplastic particles floating in the world's oceans; as small as the width of a human hair. Matthew Stock reports.
